title: Thanksgiving
description: Prepare to devour this delectable listen from a #1 New York Times bestselling author! Historical reenactor Megan Murphy hasn’t always been lucky in the love department. But this Thanksgiving, the smell of roasting turkey is wafting through the air… and so is the scent of romance! “Evanovich’s romantic humor is comfortably performed in Critt’s relaxed and inviting voice” (AudioFile).When it comes to men, Megan Murphy has an aversion to “I do”. Then she meets irresistible pediatrician Pat Hunter. Add in a cozy colonial cottage, the world’s biggest turkey, two hopeful families, and a skirt-chomping rabbit, and you’ve got a feast of fabulous fun!
author: Janet Evanovich
